GSP33nysu__3u:2401: kiñca mṛgādīnāṃ pāmārāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yadi dehātmabhedajñānaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:2402: syāttarhi”naiṣāṃ mamāhamiti dhīḥ śvasṛgālabhakṣya'; ityādayaḥ purāṇādivyavahārāḥ kathaṃ saṅgacchante
GSP33nysu__3u:2404: dehānukūlapratikūlārthayo rāgadveṣau ca dehātmabhedajñāne sati na syātām /
GSP33nysu__3u:2412: svāviviktavat svābhinne svasaṃsṛṣṭe ca yathā tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2414: ātmano(dehe) vyāptatvātsvāviviktavadvayavahārā bhavanti ityanenaikadeśatvalakṣaṇaṃ sādṛśyaṃ sambandho 'pyabhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2426: viśado hi vivekaḥ puruṣārthāya kalpate na tvautpattikaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2427: ātmano dehe vyāptatvādatyantaṃ premāspadatvādrāgādayo yujyanta eveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2428: nanu jñānameva vyavahārakāraṇaṃ taccedasti kathaṃ tarhi vyavahāreṣvapāṭavamityata āha- nahīti
GSP33nysu__3u:2433: yamalayoratyantavivekaṃ paśyanto 'pi mātrādayaḥ kathametau viviktāvavagantavyāviti pṛṣṭā evamiti svapratyakṣānubhavānusāreṇa na parānpratipādayituṃ kṣamanta ityādyanubhavasiddham kā nāmātra kathantā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2434: atha tatrātyantasādṛśyaṃ pratibandhakaṃ tarhyatrāpyaṅgāravahnivadātmano dehe vyāptatvaṃ pratibandhakamuktameva
GSP33nysu__3u:2437: ... tato hi pratyakṣasiddhaṃ nānyena kenacit // MAnuv_3,2.67cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2446: bhavatvāgamāditaḥ pratyakṣaṃ prabalaṃ mā vā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2450: āgamādikaṃ khalvāgāminaṃ viśvasya bādhaṃ pratipādayati na tu adhunātanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2455: tasya vartamānamātragrāhitvena āgāminamapi viśvasya bādhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratikṣipet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2462: tathā satīdānīntanaghaṭābhāvagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa bhaviṣyati ghaṭa ityāgamādervirodhaḥ syāditi
GSP33nysu__3u:2464: asti tāvat pratyakṣaṃ vartamānakālīnaṃ bādhābhāvamāvedayatīti parasyāpi sampratipattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2465: āgamaśca neha nānāstītyādirūpo vartamānameva viśvasya bādhaṃ pratipādayatīti kathaṃ na pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:2467: sa ca vartamānakālīnasattāgrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viruddhayata eveti tatpratipādakasyāgamādeḥ kathaṃ na pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2468: etenāsmatpratyakṣamasmanniṣṭhameva bādhaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ kṣamate na puruṣāntaragatamiti nirastam
GSP33nysu__3u:2472: tathāpi prasaktau vastusthitirvaktavyetyāśayavānpratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitāniyamamapākartumuttaraṃ prakaraṇamārabhamāṇaḥ sākṣipratyakṣasya tāvattanniyamamapākaroti- taccediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2492: bhaviṣyati mokṣa ityavagamābhāve ca tadarthaḥ prayatno na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2493: mokṣe sarvasya bādho bhaviṣyatītyetadapi na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2494: śukavāmadevādayo jñānena muktā abhūvannahamapi mukto bhaviṣyāmītyādyavagatiḥ āgamādeva bhaviṣya(tīti)ti kimatra sākṣiṇo 'tītānāgatārthagocaratvenetyata āha- āgamo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2495: āgamo 'pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2499: siddhe sati, punaḥ paścādviśeṣamanvayaviśeṣavantaṃ tameva padārthasamūhaṃ,
GSP33nysu__3u:2501: nadyāstīre pañcaphalāni santītyādau tathā darśanāditi hiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2504: yadi padārthāḥ prāṅ na siddhāstarhi padānāṃ teṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2508: atha śaktigraha eva kimartha ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2510: viśeṣaṃ jñāpayed vākyaṃ na tadajñātaśaktike // MAnuv_3,2.70 //
GSP33nysu__3u:2512: akhilamapi vākyaṃ padānāṃ padārtheṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahe jāta evānvayaviśeṣaṃ gamayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2513: natu tadvākyaṃ padārtheṣu padasamūhe 'jñātaśaktike sati viśeṣaṃ gamayedityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ, vākyasya vākyārthāvagatau kartavyāyāṃ,
GSP33nysu__3u:2516: astu śaktigrahāvaśyambhāvaḥ kintu vartamāneṣvevārtheṣu nātītānāgateṣvanupayogādityata āha- śaktiścediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2518: yadi vartamāna evārthe padānāṃ śaktirgṛhītā syāttadā vākyam atītānāgatam atītānāgatārthasaṃsargaṃ na vadet na pratipādayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2524: yadi śaktigraho 'nyatra kathaṃ sa syāt tadagrahe // MAnuv_3,2.71cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2525: vartamānādanyatrātītānāgatayorapi padaśaktigraho yadyaṅgīkṛtastadā saḥ atītānāgatārtheṣu padaśaktigrahastadagrahe 'tītānāgatārthāgrahe kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2530: vākyaṃ tāvatpadārthasaṃsargaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vākyārthameva bodhayati na padārthamātram /
GSP33nysu__3u:2536: śukavāmadevedayo muktā abhūvannahaṃ ca mukto bhaviṣyāmītyādikaṃ ca tathā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2538: naca tatsākṣiṇā vinā bhavatīti kathamatītānāgatārthagrāhiṇastasya vartamānamātraviṣayatvamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:2543: tatra sāmānyākāra eva śabdavācyo viśeṣastu lakṣya eveti tāvanniṣyaṅkitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2545: tacca vartamānaṃ cakṣurādinā dṛṣṭaṃ śabdaśaktiviṣayatayā avagatameva,
GSP33nysu__3u:2548: viśeṣāṇāṃ hi śabdavācyatve teṣāmatītādirūpatvāt śaktigrahaṇāyātītādijñānamapekṣitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2555: astu tāvatsarvaviśeṣā(ṣayā)nugataṃ nityaṃ gotvādisāmānyameva gavādiśabdavācvatvaṃ sāsnādimanto viśeṣāstu lakṣyā eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:2569: nahi sāsnādimati piṇḍe vatarmānaṃ paśutvaṃ gośabdavācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2577: tathātve darśanabhedāsambhavāditi vaiyātyādvadantaṃ pratyāha- svarūpaṃ cediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2578: svarūpaṃ cedanugataṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.73cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2582: evaṃ satyatva praśno niruttaraḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2588: tasmātkiṃ tatra vyāvṛttamiti praśne kṛte svarūpatvamityevottaraṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2590: dravyeṣvatyantaṃ vyāvṛttā dharmā antyā viśeṣā iti vaiśeṣikairaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2592: tatra yathā svarūpatvameva vyāvṛttaṃ tathā dravyeṣvapi tadevāstu kiṃ viśeṣairiti viśeṣānavajñāya tatsthāne svarūpatvamabhiṣiñcatā mīmāṃsakena kiṃ vyāvṛttamiti praśne 'ntyā viśeṣā iti vaktuṃ na śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:2596: tasya cedānīmanugatatvāṅgīkāre kathamayaṃ praśno niruttaro na bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2606: naca vācakaḥ śabdaḥ śaktigrahaṇe vinār'thaṃ bodhayatīti tatra tasya
GSP33nysu__3u:2608: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- evamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2611: evamuktaprakāreṇa vyāvṛttarūpe nissāmānye 'pi svarūpe vā bhede vā svarūpabhedādiśabdānāṃ vācakatvaśaktigraho yadāṅgīkṛto bhavettadā sa ca śaktigrahastasya svarūpāderjñānaṃ vinā kuto bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2613: sarveṣāṃ svarūpāṇāṃ bhedānāṃ ca jñāne(ca) sārvajñamāpatitamityata āha-
GSP33nysu__3u:2615: ... sāmānyato jñānaṃ vinā sa ca bhavet kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.75cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2616: sāmānyato jñānenaiva vyutpattyupapattiḥ, viśeṣato jñānābhāvācca sārvajñānāpattirityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:2617: nanu sāmānyavarjitasya svarūpādeḥ kathaṃ sāmānyato jñānamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2619: sarvamapi vastvasmābhirviśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ vyāvṛttarūpaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ ceṣyate 'to na kācidanupapattiḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:2622: yadi vyāvṛttameva syāttadoktaprakāreṇa sārvajñamāpadyeta śaktigrahābhāvo vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2625: yāvatā prāk svarūpādikaṃ nissāmānyameveti prasādhyedānīṃ sarvamapi viśeṣasāmānyarūpamiṣyata ityucyata ityata āha- vyāvṛttamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2626: vyāvṛttaṃ yacca sāmānyaṃ tadeva syād viśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.76cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2628: yadeva vyāvṛttaṃ svarūpaṃ tadeva viśeṣabalena sāmānyaṃ ca syādyatastena kāraṇena padārthānāṃ parasparamekadharmatā nāstīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2630: yatprāk svarūpabhedādau sāmānyaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ tatpadārthasvarūpāṇāṃ parasparamanugataikadharmatā nāstītyabhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33nysu__3u:2631: tadabhāve 'pi vyāvṛtta(sya)svarūpābhinnasya pratiniyatasya sāmānyākārasyābhyupagame viśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ sarvamapīṣyata ityuktamiti na
GSP33nysu__3u:2640: samudāyavyatiriktānāṃ śauklayādidharmāṇāṃ bhedadṛṣṭayā pratidharmivyāvṛttatvadarśanāttaddṛṣṭāntena gavādipadārthānāmapi parasparamekadharmatā anugatagotvādidharmavattā netyanumātavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2648: rūpādayo 'pi dharmā anuvṛttā eva na tu prativyakti bhidyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2654: śauklayamidaṃ śauklayamidamiti pratītau himaśauklayasādṛśyameva himāṃśuśauklaye pratīyate natu tenaikyamityato na virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2655: mā bhūdanugataṃ sāmānyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2657: anugatasāmānyābhāvenātītānāgatavartamānavyaktīnāmeva vācyatvādagṛhītaśaktīnāṃ ca padānāmabodhakatvāt śaktigrahaṇasya ca padārthajñānena vināsambhavādviśeṣato jñāne sārvajñāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2661: tacca sākṣiṇeti kuta ityata āha- sarvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2666: atītānāgatavartamānaṃ sarvamapi liṅgamanena sādhyena vyāptamiti jñānāpekṣaṃ khalvanumānam
GSP33nysu__3u:2669: atītādikaṃ sarvaṃ dhūmādi tathāvidhenāgnyādinā vyāptamiti jñānapūrvakaṃ khalvanumānam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2674: śaktigrahaścārthagrahāpekṣa iti sarveṣāṃ sāmānyataḥ sarvamiti jñānamaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2676: nanvanugatasāmānyābhāve vyaktīnāmānantyādvayabhicārācca śabdaśaktigraha eva na saṅgacchate
GSP33nysu__3u:2682: nanvevaṃ sati gośabdasya gavaye 'pi śaktiṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2690: evaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitvamapākṛtya mānasapratyakṣasyāpi tadapākaroti- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2694: pūrvānubhavānadhikaviṣayāyāḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyameva durlabhaṃ kuto mānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- (yadeti)tadeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2696: yadā yasmāt atītatvaviśeṣitam arthaṃ smṛtirviṣayīkarotīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2701: mānatā ca kathaṃ na syāt smṛter ... // MAnuv_3,2.81a-d //
GSP33nysu__3u:2702: yasmātsmṛtiviṣayīkṛtamatītatvaṃ vartamānatayānubhūtārthādadhikyamiṣyate sarvaistasmātsmṛtermānatā kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2703: mānatve ca mānasapratyakṣajatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāditi cārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2715: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2720: sā ca cakṣurādinaiva jāyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2723: anubhava eveti vā smṛtireveti vā smṛtyanubhavarūpaṃ jñānadvayamiti caikameva jñānamaṃśe smṛtiraṃśe 'nubhava iti veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2725: tathātve hyahamityeva syānna tu sa iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2727: tathā sati sa ityeva syānna tvayamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2730: tathāca sa ityaṃśasya smṛtitvānna cākṣuṣādipratyakṣasyātītaviṣayatvamityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2732: smṛtireva (mātrā) smṛtimātrā smṛtimātrārdhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā smṛtyanubhavarūpaikadeśasamudāyarūpā tathā smṛtyanubhavātmakaikajñānarūpā
GSP33nysu__3u:2746: tasmādanubhavarūpamekameva vijñānaṃ saṃskārasacivena cakṣurādinā jātatvātsoyamityākāraṃ bhavati
GSP33nysu__3u:2749: tathā saṃskārasacivānāmindriyāṇāṃ pratyabhijñāhetutvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2753: ato na vatarmānaikaniyamaḥ syād grahe 'kṣaje // MAnuv_3,2.83cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2756: prākaṭyāparaparyāyā)tattāprākaṭyasamākhyāyāḥ pramiteścaturthyā vidyamānatvātkathaṃ trividhaṃ viśvamityāśaṅkāṃ tāvatpariharati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2761: “pramātā ca prameyaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pramitistathā'; ityāderāgamasya vidyamānatvādityata uktam- pramāṇato 'nyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2769: yatra jñāne yo 'rtho 'vabhāsate ta(trāsau)syāsau viṣaya ityatra saptamyarthānupapattiḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:2770: tasmādyena yasyātiśaya utpadyate tasyāsau viṣaya ityaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2775: na hyasati dharmiṇi tatra dharmotpattiḥ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:2776: atha karaṇasambhavāttatra viṣayatvamityucyate tarhi vartamāne 'pi tathā sambhavānna jñātatā kalpanīyeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2779: kiñca jñānaṃ svaviṣaye jñātatāmupajanayati yatra kvacidvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2783: api ca jñātatāyāmapi jñātatotpādo 'ṅgīkriyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2785: ādye 'nubhavānārūḍhaṃ jñātatāpravāhamaṅgīkurvāṇasya kalpanāgauravaṃ syādityāha- kalpanāyā gauravācceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2786: atha jñātatā jñātatāntaramantareṇaiva viṣaya iti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2788: etena jñānaṃ svaviṣaye kiñcitkaroti kriyātvādgamanavadityanumānamapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2791: nanu jñāto ghaṭaḥ prakaṭo ghaṭa ityarthaviśeṣaṇatayā jñātatā pratyakṣamīkṣyata ityata āha- mayeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2795: kriyā hi kartṛsthaiva yadā kartṛprādhānyena vyavahriyate tadā kartṛdharmatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2805: tathā sati jñāsyāmītyeva(meva) syānna tu jānāmīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2809: tato jñātatālakṣaṇakāryeṇaivānumātavyamiti kathaṃ sā nābhyupagamyata ityata uktam- sākṣiṇamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:2814: prathamajñāne hi śuddha evārtho jñāyate na jñātatāviśiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2818: jñāta ityatra tu jñānaṃ viṣaya ityuktameveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2821: tattasmānmānādibhedena trividhameva viśvaṃ tasya kvacidapyucchittirbādho nā(stī)styevetyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:2824: svapnānāmapi caiteṣāṃ na bādho dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.86cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2826: yasmātsvapnānāmapye(te)ṣāṃ mānamātṛprameyāṇāṃ kvacitkāle na bādho dṛśyate ataḥ svapno mithyā naiveti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2837: nanu svāpnapadārthānāṃ jāgrattvaṃ yadi bhramasiddhaṃ bādhitaṃ ca tadā teṣāṃ mithyātvamavarjanīyam
GSP33nysu__3u:2846: nanu jāgaropalabdhasya śuktyāderapyanenaiva hetunā mithyātvamasmākaṃ siṣādhayiṣitameveti kathaṃ tatrānaikāntikatvamityata āha- jāgraditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:2852: etāvatā na mithyāsau svapne jāgarite tathā // MAnuv_3,2.88a-d //
GSP33nysu__3u:2855: na kṣaṇiko 'haṃ sthira eveti bādhagocaraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2859: nanu kṣaṇikatvādinā pratipanna ātmāpi mithyeti kathaṃ tatra vyabhicāra iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2863: yadyātmanyanyathā dṛśyaṃ bhrāntamatrāpi tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.89ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:2866: āropyatayā niṣedhyatayā vā bhrāntibādhaviṣayatvaṃ heturityādyapakṣe doṣamāha- abādhiteti
GSP33nysu__3u:2868: jāgrattvādeḥ rajatatvādeśca bādhāduttaramapyabādhitatvena gajādeḥ śuktyādeścānuvṛtteḥ svapnāderuktavidhā bhrāntatā bādhyatā ca kutaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2870: yathā khalu bādhottarakālamapyanuvartamāna ātmā nāropyo nāpi bādhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2874: naca kācit pramā viśvabhrāntatve sarvameva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:2875: abhrāntatve pramāṇaṃ tu kathaṃ tadbhrāntitā bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.90 //
GSP33nysu__3u:2882: dṛśyatvādihetunā svapnajāgarayobhrāntatvādisādhanātkathamasiddhirityāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ bhrāntatvaṃ prakārāntareṇa dūṣayati- kiñceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2883: kiñca bhrāntatvavādī sa bhrāntatvaṃ svamatasya ca /

GSP33nysu__3u:3110: sarvaśarīreṣu, pratiśarīraṃ ca dakṣiṇākṣyādisthāneṣu, sthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svapanādyavasthāḥ pravartayatītyuktam /

GSP33nysu__3u:3435: tadetattātparyaṃ sūtrākṣaraiḥ kataṃ labhyata ityata (etacchabda)idaṃśabdaparāmṛṣṭamarthaṃ tāvaddarśayati- yaduktamiti //

GSP33nysu__3u:4244: tattadattumadhriyate'; ityādikāṃ sañjahāretyanena, sa ānandādiḥ saḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:4247: “sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata, ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti,
GSP33nysu__3u:4248: tattadattumadhriyata, sa aikṣata so 'kāmayata, ānandam brahmaṇo vidvān';
GSP33nysu__3u:4249: ityādiśrutyā sarjanādikaṃ brahmaṇo viśeṣo 'tiśayo na brahmamātramityavagamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4252: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma ekadhaivānudraṣṭavyam'; ityādiśrutyaiva tasya tenābhedaścāvagamyate
GSP33nysu__3u:4255: kriyādīnāṃ nityatā śaktivyaktirūpatā vyaktirūpasyāpi nityatā śaktirūpapābhinnatā saviśeṣatā viśeṣasyāpyabhedaḥ svanirvāhakatā ceti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4262: samavāyābhāve 'pi vā dharmadharmiṇoreva sa ko 'pi mahimā kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4266: apara āha akhaṇḍameva brahma na tu tatra kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4270: ānandaṃ ityādīnāṃ ca rāhoḥ śira ityādivadupacaritatvopapatteriti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4276: bhedo yadi viśeṣasya sa bhedo bhedinā katham // MAnuv_3,2.163ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4277: viśeṣasya jñānāderbrahmadharmasya, yadi brahmaṇo bhedo 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pṛcchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4278: sa bhedo, bhedinā brahmaṇā jñānādinā ca saha, kathaṃ kiṃ prakāraḥ,
GSP33nysu__3u:4283: yadi bhedo bhedibhyāṃ bhinnastadā so 'pi bhedastathetyanavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4288: abhinnatve 'pi vaktavyaṃ saviśeṣābhinna uta nirviśeṣābhinna iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4293: bheda iva vināpi bhedena viśeṣeṇaivopapattāvapi vṛthā paramparākalpanāyāṃ gauravaṃ syāttato dharmāṇāmeva saviśeṣābhedāṅgīkāraḥ śreyāniti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4302: bhedo yadi bhedibhyāmabhinno nirviśeṣaśca syāttadā tasya tadbhedatā tayorayaṃ bheda ityevambhāvaḥ kuto na kuto 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4304: tanmātratve ca dharmadharmiṇāveva sto na bheda iti syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4306: bheda evāsti na dharmadharmiṇāviti vā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:4311: bheda evaiṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,2.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4312: bhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti sa bheda eva viśeṣato viśeṣaṇatvena dṛśyate na tu
GSP33nysu__3u:4317: paṭādbhinnastambhādbhinno ghaṭa ityeṣa bheda eva saviśeṣaḥ pratiyogiviśeṣasāhityena dṛśyate
GSP33nysu__3u:4318: tathāyaṃ padārtho 'nena vakratvenānena koṭaravattvena puruṣādbhinna iti sa eṣa bheda eva viśeṣato vyāvartakadharmeṇa dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4320: tathāsmātpaṭādasmātstambhādasmātkuḍyādbhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa ityeṣa bheda eva saviśeṣataḥ pratiyogiviśeṣasāhityena nimittena bahudhā dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4322: ato na bhedo ghaṭasya svarūpamiti yatsvarūpabhedasya dūṣaṇaṃ parairucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4323: tattasya kimuttaraṃ tvayābhidhāsyate, yadi viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyate, ityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:4324: yadi viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyate tadā bhedo bhedinābhinna ityapi nāṅgīkartuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4326: viśeṣaṇaiva hi teṣāmanyathāsiddhiṃ vyutpādya pratītibalena bhedasya bhedinābhedo vaktavyo nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4327: tadīyatvena viśeṣaṇatvena sapratiyogitvena liṅgitvena bahutvena ca pratīyamāno 'nyonyābhāvādirūpo bhedo na bhedisvarūpatayāṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4328: yastu svarūpatayāṅgīkriyate nāsau tadīyatvādinā pratīyata iti tasyottaraṃ brūma iti cenna
GSP33nysu__3u:4330: anyathā svarūpasyaiva bheda iti pāribhāṣikaṃ nāmāntaramuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4354: abhedabhedaśabdau ca paryāyāviti ko vadet // MAnuv_3,2.167ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4356: pratyutāparyāyāvityeva vadati sarva ityaprāmāṇikaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ caitaditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4360: tathāca bhedābhedaśabdayoḥ paryāyatvaprāptau viśeṣabalenaiva hi tatpariharaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4367: yadyapi bhedābhedayoḥ bhedinā ghaṭena sahābhedastathāpi tayoranyonyaṃ bhedo 'stīti na tacchabdayoḥ paryāyatvaṃ prasajyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4375: viśeṣābhāve bhedo bhedinā eko 'bhinnastathābhidā bhedinā ghaṭenābhinnā,
GSP33nysu__3u:4380: ghaṭenābhinnayorbhedābhedayoḥ parasparaṃ bheda(kārya)nirvāhārthaṃ ghaṭena saviśeṣa evābhedo 'ṅgīkārya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4389: tathāca bhedābhedayorghaṭatanmātratvābhāvena parasparaṃ bhedopapatterna śabdayoḥ paryāyatvam
GSP33nysu__3u:4390: tataśca bhedābhedayoḥ parasparamabhedo viśeṣaścāṅgīkāyar ityasaditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:4391: evamapi dharmadharmiṇorbhedamabhyupagacchatāntato 'bhinne vastuni viśeṣo 'ṅgīrktavya ityabhimataṃ yadyapi siddhameva, tathāpyuktaṃ tattvaṃ na
GSP33nysu__3u:4398: kalpanāgauravāyaiva kiṃ bhedaḥ kalpyate tadā // MAnuv_3,2.170 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4400: cedbhedābhedayostarhi bhedaḥ kiṃ kalpanāgauravāyaiva kalpyata iti solluṇṭhavacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4401: bhedābhedayorghaṭeneva parasparamapi saviśeṣatvenaiva sarvasyopapattau bhedakalpane kalpanāgauravaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4403: astvevaṃ tataḥ kimāyātaṃ prakṛta ityata āha- viśeṣeṇaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4406: 'pyaparyāyaśabdavyavahṛtiryadi viśeṣeṇaiva bhavet tadā dharmadhamirṇorapi bhedaḥ kiṃ kalpanāgauravāyaiva kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4407: dharmadhamirṇorbhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpyantato viśeṣo 'ṅgīkāryaḥ tato varamādita eva tadaṅgīkaraṇam
GSP33nysu__3u:4413: tathāca bheda eva jagati na syādityata āha- aikyeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4418: aikyapratītyabhāve 'pi kuto viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyata ityata āha- sa eveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4419: sa eveti pratītau hi viśeṣo nāma bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,2.171cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:4435: tathāpi”satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; ityādīni tāvatsatyaviṣayāṇi pareṇāṅgīkṛtānyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:4446: satyādipadānāṃ vidhivācitve vidhīyamānānāṃ satyatvādiviśeṣaṇānāṃ brahmaṇyabhāvāt svarūpamātrasya caikatvātparyāyatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4450: santi hi nāsti brahma, sadapi na jñānaṃ paricchinnaṃ (ce)vetyādipratītayaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:4455: brahmaṇi tu lakṣaṇayā pravartanta iti na tatra viśeṣaṇāni samarpayanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4461: ato na paryāyatvaṃ nāpi vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4476: na hyāropitena rūpeṇa gaganasya nīrūpatā vihanyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4480: evaṃ tarhi na ko 'pi vākyārtho vyavasthitaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4486: yadvā pratītā sā ca svābhāvavyāvartakatvenaiva vyavatiṣṭhate na brahmaviṣayatvena /
GSP33nysu__3u:4489: sāpi tathā cet anavasthitiḥ brahmajñānasyāvyavasthaiveti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4490: na kevalaṃ brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatve padānāṃ paunaruktyādi(kaṃ)
GSP33nysu__3u:4491: kinnāmaikasyāpi padasya tatra pravṛttirna bhavedityāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4492: yadi satye viśeṣo na na taduktirbhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,2.174ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4496: syādayaṃ doṣo yadi brahma śabdābhidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4507: nanu lakṣyatvamapi brahmaṇo nāstyeva lakṣyamityapi lakṣaṇayaivocyate nābhidhānavṛttyeti cenna
GSP33nysu__3u:4519: “neha nānāsti'; iti śrutiḥ”iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti'; itivadabhāvaṃ brahmaṇyaṅgīkarotyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:4535: yathā hi satyajñānādipadāni brahmaṇi śrūyante, evameṣa sarvajñaḥ, eṣa
GSP33nysu__3u:4538: tataśca satyajñānādivākyaṃ tattvāvedakaṃ sārvajñādivākyaṃ māyāśabalaparamiti vibhāgo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4539: mā bhūdayaṃ vibhāgo 'sārvajñādyabhāvo 'pi brahmaṇyaṅgīkriyata evetyata āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4543: dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayata iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4548: sarvajñādipadaṃ brahmaṇi śrūyamāṇamasārvajñādinivṛttiṃ bodhayatītyetādṛśaṃ prameyaṃ yadi na grāhyaṃ tadā'nandapadamapyasukhatvaṃ na nivartayet,
GSP33nysu__3u:4549: satyapadaṃ cāsatyatvam, jñānapadaṃ cājñānatvam, ātmapadaṃ cānātmatvam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4561: yadvā yadi naitādṛśamityadhyāhāreṇa vinaikameva vākyaṃ buddhayā vivicya tu yojyamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4582: mahādareṇa śirasi viśeṣo dhārya eva hi // MAnuv_3,2.180 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4583: yasmādevamakhaṇḍavādibhyāṃ viśeṣo 'ṅgīkāryastattasmādeva hi khaṇḍākhaḍena khaṇḍākhaṇḍavādinā ca viśeṣo 'ṅgīkārya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:4584: kuntāḥ praviśantītivadupalakṣaṇayā arśaādibhyo 'jiti vā khaṇḍākhaṇḍeneti sādhu /
GSP33nysu__3u:4586: dharmadharmiṇorbhedābhedāviti vadatā tau kiṃ tābhyāmatyantaṃ bhinnāvaṅgīkriyete utātyantābhinnāvatha bhinnābhinnau /
GSP33nysu__3u:4604: prakāśaśca dravyāntaraṃ na sūryābhinna ityataḥ prakāśāśrayavadveti nidarśanamapi nātyantābhedopayuktam
GSP33nysu__3u:4605: kālasya pūrvatvaṃ nāma pradhvastakriyāsambandha iti na pūrvavadvetyapi prakṛtānuguṇamityata āha- nidarśaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4617: nanvekenaiva nidarśanenālaṃ kiṃ trayeṇetyata uktam- ādareṇeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4621: tasmādeva bhagavaddharmāṇāṃ bhagavatā saviśeṣābhedasya samarthitatvādeva padābhihitaiḥ padārthairanvayabodha ityetanmataṃ neti labhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4639: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidityādibrahmapratipādakavākyagatāni sakalānyapi padānyanvitārthābhidhāyīni /
GSP33nysu__3u:4642: yataḥ sāmānyata evānvitābhidhāne śaktiḥ padānāṃ nānvayaviśeṣābhidhāne /
GSP33nysu__3u:4643: ato brahmapadena sāmānyataḥ samastayogyadharmānvite brahmaṇi pratīte satyatvenānvitaṃ jñānatvenānvitamiti viśeṣānvayapratipattyarthāni satyādipadānīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4648: na punaḥ padānyeva na padābhihitārthādīnīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4649: tatra vyākhyātāraṃ prati kuto 'yaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhiprāya iti bhavatyeva paricodanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:4652: tathāpyadhikaraṇasiddhāntavarṇanamiṣeṇa tatra saṃkṣepato vyutpāditopapattīnāṃ prapañcāya prayatno 'yamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4653: taditi parāmṛṣṭaṃ hetuṃ darśayati- yata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4669: nacādyaṃ padaṃ sāmānyato 'nvitābhidhāyyuttaraṃ tu viśeṣata iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4671: vedavākye 'pi hi kvacidbrahmapadamādyaṃ kvaciduttaramityata āha- sāmānyata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4679: rūpasya hi ghaṭenābheda iti tvacā tasmingṛhīte tadapi gṛhyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:4685: ekasya siddhāvanuṣaṅgī yo 'rthaḥ siddhayati so 'dhikaraṇasiddhānto na hi sambhāvanāsiddhirityata āha- svārtha eveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4688: yasmātkenacidanvita eva padānāṃ svārtha iti, anena satyatvena jñānatvena
GSP33nysu__3u:4689: vānvita iti, tadviśeṣato dharmaviśeṣeṇa anvayaḥ taduktyaiva satyādipadoktyaiva jñāyata ityanubha(vena)vasiddham
GSP33nysu__3u:4696: sa ca yathānubhavameva svīkārya iti nātiprasaṅga kaściditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4697: evaṃ pratijñātamanvitābhidhānamupapādya yaduktamabhihitānvayādipakṣāṇāmayuktatvaṃ tadanvitābhidhānānaṅgīkāre bādhakapradarśanamukhenopapādayati- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4699: tathānyānyapi sarvāṇi kaḥ kuryādanvayaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.185 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4705: uttarāṇi tvādita eva labdhasahāyāni viśeṣata evānvitābhidhāyīni /
GSP33nysu__3u:4707: anyathā yadi vākyasthāni samastāni padāni nānvitābhidhāyīni kintvananvitāneva svārthānabhidadhatīti, tarhyanvayajñānaṃ nirnibandhanamāpadyetetyavakṣyat /
GSP33nysu__3u:4711: anvayasya kathaṃ jñānaṃ śabdārthatvaṃ yadāsya na // MAnuv_3,2.187ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4712: yadā yadyasyānvayasya śabdārthatvaṃ padābhidheyatvaṃ na syāttarhyanvayasya jñānaṃ kathaṃ na kathañcit /
GSP33nysu__3u:4714: tathāhi anvayajñānātpūrvabhāvitvena vādibhiraṅgīkṛtatvena vā prasaktāni tāvadetāni padāni vā vaktā vā padairabhihitāḥ padārthā vā vākyaṃ vā vākyāntyavarṇo vā varṇamālā vā sphoṭo vā śrotā veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4715: tatra tāvadanvitābhidhānānaṅgīkāre padānāmupāyatvaṃ nopapadyata ityetadvayāpāro na hītyardhenāha
GSP33nysu__3u:4716: śabdasya padasya, svārthaprakāśanādanyo vyāpāro nāstīti tāvatsuprasiddham
GSP33nysu__3u:4740: sa padārthaiḥ pratipādito 'nvayasteṣāṃ padānāmartho na hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4741: tathā sati pratyakṣāvagatadhūmapratipāditasyāgneḥ pratyakṣaprameyatvaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4742: astu tarhi vākyasyānvayabodhakatvamiti pakṣa ityata āha- nirākāṅkṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4749: gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyādipadānāṃ vākyatvaṃ mā bhūditi nirākāṅkṣetyuktam
GSP33nysu__3u:4750: sannidhānābhāve nirākāṅkṣatvameva na nirvahatīti nirākāṅkṣatvenaiva sannidhānasya labdhatvānna pṛ(tatpṛ)thaguktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4754: yathā khalu tantūnāṃ vikriyāviśeṣaḥ paṭo na tantumātram /
GSP33nysu__3u:4755: tathā padānāṃ yo nirākāṅkṣatālakṣaṇo vikriyāviśeṣaḥ sa śakyaṃ,
GSP33nysu__3u:4758: na tantūnāṃ paṭa iva padānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatā vikriyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:4763: sā ca nirākāṅkṣatā padaiḥ syāditi padāni nirākāṅkṣāṇītyucyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:4767: tathāca jijñāsitārthānabhidadhati jijñāsāṃ nivartayanti padāni nirākāṅkṣāṇītyuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33nysu__3u:4774: śābdī jijñāsā yāvatpadāni jijñāsitā(nar)thānnābhidadhati tāvanna nivartate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4775: nivartate ca padaisteṣvabhihiteṣvityato 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vijñāyate tattadarthābhidhānenaiva nirākāṅkṣatā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4778: astu tarhi nirastavarṇapadavibhāgaṃ sphoṭākhyaṃ vākyamevānvayasya pratipādakam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4779: padāni tu tadabhivyañjakatayopayujyanta iti pakṣa ityata āha- karmeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4780: karmakartṛkriyāṇāṃ tu pūrtau ko 'nyo 'nvayo bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.190cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:4787: sphoṭamanvayasya pratipādakaṃ vadatā tatsadbhāve pramāṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4790: naca tadatirikto 'nvayo nāmāsti pratipādanīyo yadarthaṃ sphoṭānveṣaṇamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:4792: apūrtiścet padairuktaiḥ kiṃ nṛśṛṅgeṇa pūryate // MAnuv_3,2.191ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4801: yato niṣpramāṇakaḥ sphoṭastasyānvayapratipādakatvaṃ ceti dvayaṃ kalpanīyamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4803: yadi hi padāni padārthānpratipādyaiva nivartante padārthā evānvayaṃ bodhayantīti mataṃ tadā syādevoktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4808: tataḥ ko doṣa ityata āha- vyāpāraścediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4809: vyāpāraścet punasteṣāmanuktāvapi kiṃ na saḥ // MAnuv_3,2.191cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:4810: acetanānāmapi padānāṃ yadi punarvyāpāro viramyavyāpāro 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pṛcchāmo 'nuktānāmapi padānāṃ padārthādipratipādane vyāpāraḥ kuto na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4815: padāni hi jñātakaraṇāni na tu cakṣurādivatsattāmātreṇa /
GSP33nysu__3u:4816: uktistu(śca tajjñā)jñānopāvaya ityato 'nuktau jñātatvābhāvānna vyāpāra ityāśayaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:9936: tad yathā peśaskarī peśaso mātrāmapādāyānyannavataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ tanuta evamevāyamātmedaṃ śarīraṃ nihatyāvidyāṃ gamayitavānyannavataraṃ kalyāṇataraṃ rūpaṃ kurute pitṛyaṃ pitṛyaṃ vā gāndharvaṃ vā daivaṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā brāhmaṃ vānyeṣāṃ vā bhūtānām // MAnuv_3,4.112 //
GSP33nysu__3u:9943: atra devāsurāṇāṃ samyagviparītopāsanābhyāṃ mokṣatamasoḥ prāptiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:9952: atra suvarṇasyaiva yathā rucikādibhāvaḥ suvarṇakāreṇa kriyate na yasya kasyaciddravyasya tathā muktiyogyānāmeveśvareṇa muktatvaṃ kriyate nānyeṣāmiti pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:9956: na tāṃ gatiṃ prapadyante vinā bhāgavatān narān // MAnuv_3,4.113 //
GSP33nysu__3u:9957: purā satye yuga iti prakṛtānāṃ devatāsvabhāvānāṃ prayāntītyanena mokṣādiphalaprāptimuktvā yā na prāpyetyasurāṇāṃ na tāṃ gatimiti manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kadācittatprāptirnāstītyucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:9961: rākṣasīmāsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohanīṃ śritāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.115 //
GSP33nysu__3u:9966: mahātmana ityatra bhagavadbhajanādilakṣaṇadevatvaṃ svabhāva iti pratīyate

GSP33nysu__3u:9975: abhayamityanenābhayādilakṣaṇaṃ devatvaṃ dambhādilakṣaṇaṃ cāsuratvaṃ svabhāva eveti jñāyate
GSP33nysu__3u:9980: māmaprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yāntyadhamāṃ gatim // MAnuv_3,4.122 //
GSP33nysu__3u:9982: dvividho bhūtasargo 'tra daiva āsura eva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:9984: devānāṃ paramo dharmaḥ sadā yajñādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:9989: śive sūrye tathā devyāṃ svabhāvo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.126 //
GSP33nysu__3u:9999: paramo dharma iti yajñādikānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10001: ratiḥ smṛtiśca viṣṇoḥ śivasya ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10015: yadyanādirviśeṣo na sāmprataṃ kathameva saḥ // MAnuv_3,4.129ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10019: yadi hiraṇyagarbhasyānādiḥ sarvotkṛṣṭo yogyatālakṣaṇo viśeṣo na syāttadā sāmprataṃ dṛśyamānaṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10024: nanu brahmādīnāṃ yogyatālakṣaṇānādiviśeṣābhāve 'pi sādino viśiṣyādṛṣṭādeva sarvotkṛṣṭatvādikaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10028: kiṃ tadviriñcasya sarvotkarṣabījaṃ viśiṣyamadṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ prāktanatathāvidhamadṛṣṭamanapekṣyaiva jāyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10034: tasmānna kevalaṃ phalaṃ kinnāmottarottaramadṛṣṭaṃ ca pūrvapūrvādṛṣṭādbhavatīti cārvākavyatiriktasarvavādibhiḥ svīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10036: bhavatvanyeṣāṃ vādināmitthaṃ siddhānto mama tu sarvotkarṣādiphalotpattāveva viśiṣyādṛṣṭāpekṣā natu tadutpattāvapīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10037: yadvā yadviriñcasya sarvotkarṣanimittaṃ viśiṣyamadṛṣṭaṃ tasya tathāvidhādṛṣṭakāryatve 'pi tasya nādṛṣṭakāryatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10038: sarvasyāpi pravāhasya tathātve hi bhavatāmiṣyasiddhiriti vadantaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:10048: yadyevaṃ na vivrīyeta tarhi pareṇādṛṣṭasya niṣkāraṇatāyā anaṅgīkṛtatvādasaṅgato 'yaṃ prasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10052: kiñca viśiṣyo dṛṣṭakāraṇakalāpo 'pi tasya kuta iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10057: astu tarhi dvitīyaḥ pakṣa iti tatrāha- adṛṣṭāccediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10058: adṛṣṭāśced viśeṣo 'yamanāditvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.130ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:10069: tathā cānādiviśiṣyādṛṣṭapravāhāśrayatvaṃ tasyaiva kuta ityanuyogasya nānyaduttaramanāderviśiṣyasvabhāvāt
GSP33nysu__3u:10079: etadapi tatraiva kuto na dūṣitamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10081: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu nirākaraṇaṃ tatra vātra vā na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10085: kiñcātra jñānasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatprasaṅgaśca jñānapāde samucitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10088: tarhi tatraivāyaṃ granthasandarbhaḥ kuto na niveśita iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10093: teṣāṃ ca parasparaṃ bhedastakālavartināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10100: vedādhidoṣāśca pratyakṣeṇekṣyanta iti na bhagavato nirdeṣatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10107: anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ yathānekatvātirikto 'nyonyābhāvalakṣaṇo bhedo dṛśyate na tatheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10108: viṣṇau bhedo na dṛśyata ityevokte 'nekatvasyāpyadarśanaṃ pratīyeta tadarthamidaṃ vacanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10109: yadvā yathā viṣṇāvanyapratiyogiko bhedo dṛśyate na tathā svapratiyogika iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10110: anyathā ghaṭādipratiyogiko 'pi bhedo na dṛśyata ityapi pratīyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:10114: adhunātanairbhedo na dṛśyata iti parasyāpi sammatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10121: tatra daivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tāvadavatārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ na bhedaṃ gocarayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10124: uttamānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ bhagavato bahurūpeṣu tadevedamityabhedaviṣayā pratyabhijñaiva purāṇādau dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10125: yathā jāmbavataḥ sa rāma evāyaṃ kṛṣṇa iti pratyabhijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10128: tathā ca bahurūpeṣu pratyabhijñā na sambhavatyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:10129: sambhavantī vā bhrāntiḥ syādityata āha- bahutvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10140: evamuttamānāṃ puṃsāṃ bhagavadekarūpadarśanasamaye rūpāntarapratītāvasatyāṃ tato bhedajñānamasambhāvitam
GSP33nysu__3u:10143: tathāpi madhyamādijanānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhagavadrūpabhede pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GSP33nysu__3u:10147: pratyabhijñā ca yeṣāṃ na te 'pi tanmuṣyadṛṣṭayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.132cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10149: yeṣāṃ tu madhyamānāṃ janānāṃ pratyabhijñā bhagavadrūpeṣu nāsti te 'pi
GSP33nysu__3u:10151: pratyabhijñābhāve kāraṇaṃ tena bhagavatā muṣyāpahatā dṛṣṭireṣāmiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10153: bhagavadicchāyā teṣāṃ yogyatayā copodbalitaṃ bahutvamupalabhyamānaṃ pratīyamāne('pi) vastuni vidyamānasyāpyabhedasya jñānaṃ pratibadhnāti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10156: bhagavadrūpe bhedaṃ naiva paśyantītyukte ghaṭādibhyo 'pi bhedaṃ na paśyantīti mandasya pratītiḥ syāttāṃ nivārayitumāha- bhedamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10157: bhedaṃ naiva prapaśyanti bhedamanyebhya eva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:10160: nanu pratīyamānaṃ vastudvayaṃ bhedena vā pratīyate 'bhedena vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10161: bhedābhedodāsīnatayā tu pratītiḥ kathamityata āha- evamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10169: tathā parameśvaraśaktyātrāpi tathā pratītau ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10179: purāṇameva vedasya kinna bādhakaṃ bhavatītyata āha- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10183: purāṇavacanaṃ khalu lokānāṃ yadbhagavadrūpeṣu bhedadarśanaṃ tadanuvādaparameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:10197: tarhi tadeva bhagavadrūpabhede pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10205: atha bhedadarśanamevābhedadarśanasya bādhakaṃ kuto na bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33nysu__3u:10212: parīkṣāpūrvaṃ darśanaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayo yasya pratyakṣasyeti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10214: tadanena yatparīkṣayā na niścitaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānaṃ na tannimittaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ bādhata iti vyāptiruktā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10218: yathā yajñadattādāvaniściprāmāṇyā devadattādidṛṣṭirna niścitaprāmāṇyāṃ yajñadattādidṛṣṭiṃ bādhate tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10221: ato na tattasya bādhakaṃ kintu vaiparītyameveti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10229: purāṇavākyaṃ ca kecidbhedaṃ paśyantīti vā pratipādayatu /
GSP33nysu__3u:10233: ataḥ pramāṇābhāvānna bhedadaśarnasya prāmāṇyaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10237: dvitīyābhiprāyeṇa tu bhedasya darśana iti samāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10239: niścitaṃ parīkṣitaṃ ca tadbhedasyadarśanaṃ ceti tathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10241: yadi purāṇavākyā(deva)nniścitaprāmāṇyaṃ bhedadarśanaṃ na pratīyeta tarhi kīdṛśaṃ tatpratīyata ityata āha- sammugdhamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10261: idameva tasya bādhakaṃ kinna syādityata āha- aparīkṣitameveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10263: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyate kenacit kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.137 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10274: nanu doṣābhāvaviṣayaṃ mahatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ tāvatkutaḥ siddhamityata āha-
GSP33nysu__3u:10277: nirdoṣameva rudro 'drāṅ nirdoṣaṃ taṃ purandaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.138 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10280: iti barkuśruteścaiva sadoṣaṃ nāsya darśanam // MAnuv_3,4.139 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10288: asya parameśvarasya viṣaye mahatāṃ darśanaṃ sadoṣaṃ doṣagrāhi naiva, kintu nirdeṣameva gṛhṇātīti
GSP33nysu__3u:10289: doṣadaśarnamaparīkṣitaṃ tadabhāvadarśanaṃ tu parīkṣitametatkuta ityata āha- aviddha iti
GSP33nysu__3u:10292: iti paiṅgiśrutiścaiva prāha nirdoṣatāṃ hareḥ // MAnuv_3,4.140 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10301: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyo doṣo hareḥ kvacit /
GSP33nysu__3u:10314: svata eva jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ (gṛhyate) natu parīkṣādhīnam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10316: ataḥ svenaiva svayaṃ svaprāmāṇyaṃ ca siddhayati kā tatra parīkṣāpekṣeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10320: jñānaṃ tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣiṇaiva jñāyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10321: yadi ca svataḥprāmāṇyagraho na syāttarhi na syādeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:10324: tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca parīkṣāntareṇeti kathaṃ nānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10337: saṃśayaśca manovṛttiviṣaye pānīyādau bhavati na punaḥ sākṣisiddhe sukhādau /
GSP33nysu__3u:10338: atastāvadeva parīkṣā yāvatsākṣigṛhīteṣu sukhādiṣvavatāra iti kuto
GSP33nysu__3u:10341: manovṛttiviṣaya eva saṃśayo na sākṣisiddha ityatra kiṃ kāraṇamityata āha-
GSP33nysu__3u:10343: mānase darśane doṣāḥ syurnavai sākṣidarśane // MAnuv_3,4.142cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10351: yathā sthāṇutayā(vadayaṃ) pratīyate sthāṇurbhavati na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10355: atastatsaṃśayātmakaṃ vā jāyate niścayatayā jātasya viṣaye vā āhāyarḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10357: ato na tatsaṃśayātmakaṃ nāpi (sākṣisiddhe)tatsiddhe 'rthe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10359: sākṣidarśane na sambhavantītyetatkuta ityata āha- sudṛḍha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10360: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tat sākṣidarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.142ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:10368: sākṣidarśanaṃ ca nirṇayātmakameva bhavati na ca bādhyata ityupapāditaṃ pṛthagadhikaraṇe /
GSP33nysu__3u:10370: sākṣisiddhe 'rthe saṃśayo nāstītyuktaṃ tadanubhavārūḍhaṃ kartuṃ sākṣisiddhamarthaṃ tāvadāha- iccheti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10375: ... na kaściddhi tatra saṃśayavān kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.143cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10377: na jātu mama sukhamasti na veti saṃśayo nāpi pratīyamānamidaṃ sukhaṃ sadasadveti saṃśaya iti hiśabdenāha /
GSP33nysu__3u:10379: nahi pratītisamayamātravartini tatrānyajñānaṃ sambhavatītyata āha- yadīti
GSP33nysu__3u:10380: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:10381: yaddarśanaṃ kvacicchuktirajatādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitaṃ syāttaccakṣurādikaraṇakaṃ manaḥpariṇatirūpameva na sākṣirūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10388: kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyamityata āha- mana iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10390: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10397: yatra jñāne sugṛhītaṃ parīkṣayā niścitaṃ tatparīkṣitadarśanaṃ pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10399: dharmijñānānumānopamānānuvyavasāyānāṃ tu prāmāṇyagrahaṇaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣamiti kecinmanyante
GSP33nysu__3u:10406: sākṣivatpratyakṣādijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyagrahaḥ parīkṣānapekṣa evoktavidhayā svataḥ kinna syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10407: na jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.145ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10417: bhavatu vā jñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ tathāpi svarūpamātra eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10419: vedavākyaśravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākyārthajñānamutpadyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10428: tato jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa na jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyata iti dvitīya evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10429: tathāca svaprakāśajñānenaiva prāmāṇyagraha iti kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10430: apauruṣeyatvādiyuktibhiḥ prabodhito bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tatprāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣatvam
GSP33nysu__3u:10431: anyathā vaidikajñānaprāmāṇye vipratipattireva na syāt jñānasvarūpavat /
GSP33nysu__3u:10433: idamanubhavasya rajatasmaraṇasya ca bhedāgraho hi vibhramaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10442: anumeyatve 'pi jñānasya na jñānānumitimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10446: tato jñātatādimātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhābhāvādinā prāmāṇyamanumeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10450: idameva cāsmābhirabhidhāsyate, sarvathā parīkṣānapekṣeti tu na kṣamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10468: yadi vṛttijñānānāmiva sākṣijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ taddarśanamātreṇa na dṛśyate tadādhikamapi kāraṇaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10476: svaprāmāṇyaṃ sadā sākṣī paśyatyeva suniścayāt // MAnuv_3,4.146ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10484: tathāca na vilakṣaṇatvāditi yatsvataḥ prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ tattyaktaṃ syādityata
GSP33nysu__3u:10487: jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇaiva jñānasya mānatāyā miteḥ kāraṇātsvataḥprāmāṇyamiṣyata eveti sambandhaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:10488: bhavetsvataḥprāmāṇyatyāgo yadi jñānameva sākṣivedyaṃ na prāmāṇyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10491: kimarthaṃ tarhi parīkṣāvaśyambhāvo 'bhyupagamyata ityata āha- doṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10495: jñānaṃ gṛhṇansākṣī karaṇadoṣābhāve 'sya prāmāṇyamityeva prāmāṇyaṃ niścinoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10506: syādetadyadīyaṃ prakriyā pramāṇavatī syānna ca tadastītyata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10507: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10508: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10509: ata eva hi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prathamato na niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10510: kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavati tattadaiva prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyasvarūpamaprāmāṇyaviviktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10512: yadi sākṣī doṣābhāve pramāṇametaditi prathamaṃ sammugdhaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītvā paścājjijñāsāyāṃ satyāṃ parīkṣayā pramāṇamevetyavadhārayatītyeṣā prakriyā nāṅgīkriyeta tadānabhyastaviṣayāṇāṃ śabdādinā jātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi jñānānāṃ prathamameva prāmāṇyamavadhāryeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:10516: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10519: yasmātsukhādyeṣu kaścitsaṃśayaṃ na karoti yasmāccākhilāni vṛttijñānāni darśana eva pramāṇatayākhilo jano na niścinoti tasmātsākṣiprāmāṇyaṃ parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10523: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10525: svasya parīkṣāyāśca doṣābhāvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca parīkṣānirapekṣaḥ sākṣyeva samyak prapaśyati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10528: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.151ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10530: tena ca bhagavati kvacidapi doṣo nāstīti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:10532: evamaparīkṣitaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ parīkṣitena nirdeṣatādarśanena bādhitaṃ na bhagavato doṣitvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaktamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10544: yatra yadākṣajamāgamasyopajīvyaṃ tat tadā pratyakṣaviruddhārthe jātyā prabalasyāpyāgamasya mānatā nāsti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10550: laukike pratyakṣasiddhajīvādiviṣaye brahmātmakatvādibodhanarūpe vyavahāre tattvamasyādyāgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamaṃ prati pratyakṣasyopajīvyatā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10551: avatārāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ ca doṣadṛṣṭau pratyakṣādikaṃ pratyāgamasyopajīvyatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10557: anena doṣaviṣayapratyakṣavirodhādāgamasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kinna syāditi codyaṃ garbhasrāveṇaiva gatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10560: āgamena hi viṣṇutvaṃ jñātvā doṣo 'tra kalpyate // MAnuv_3,4.154ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10562: vastutaḥ kalpanaivaiṣā na pramitiritibhāvena kalpyata ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10564: tadeva na jñātavyamityata āha- na cediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10566: yadi viṣṇutvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇādau na jñātaṃ tadā doṣagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti gṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10568: nahi devadatte devadattatvājñāne devadatto 'yamāgata ityākāraṃ jñānamutpattumarhatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10570: yataḥ śrīvatsakaustubhādilakṣaṇena viṣṇutvamanumāya viṣṇurdeṣavāniti pratyakṣeṇa jñāsyata ityata āha- śāstreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10575: nanu viṣṇutvājñāne viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti jñānena kuto bhāvyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10581: nanu yathā paṭo 'yaṃ chinno dagdho malina iti parānupajīvinā pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10584: na viṣṇordeṣavattve hi pratyakṣaṃ vartate svataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.155cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10590: yathā pañcapalaparimito 'yaṃ paṭo malina iti jñānamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10593: viṣṇurayaṃ doṣavāniti vā viṣṇoranyo 'yaṃ doṣavāniti vā kaścidayaṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:10609: sa ca sarvarūpopetasya viṣṇornirdeṣatvaṃ pratipādayatīti tadvirodhādapramāṇameva doṣaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10630: tatpurāṇavākyaṃ taddoṣadarśanaṃ kiṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇatayā manyate,
GSP33nysu__3u:10634: bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣagrāhiṇīṃ pratītiṃ pramāṇatayā pratipādayatpurāṇavākyaṃ doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:10635: na hi sambhavati tadgrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti nāṅgīkaroti ca taditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10636: doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyamānaṃ ca tatprāgudāhṛtayā śrutyaiva viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10637: purāṇavākyasya śrutiviruddhatve ko doṣa ityata āha- purāṇasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10640: yataḥ kenacitkāraṇena kañcidarthaṃ buddhisthīkṛtya vākyaṃ prayuñjmahe /
GSP33nysu__3u:10642: purāṇavākyasya ca veda eva mūlaṃ kuta ityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10652: ataḥ pariśeṣādveda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:10654: tadvirodhe kathaṃ mānaṃ tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_3,4.157cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10659: nanvīśvarapraṇītānāṃ purāṇānāṃ tadīyaṃ nijaṃ jñānameva mūlaṃ na vedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10667: tathāpi veda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti katham /
GSP33nysu__3u:10676: akṣajaṃ kathameva bhavediti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇatayābhilaṣitārthe nodbhāvayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10679: yadyevaṃ devadattādibhramaḥ kiṃ nākṣajaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.158cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10690: dṛśyate hyupajīvyasyāpīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasyopajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānena bādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10693: pratiṣedhātmakaṃ tu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvakamiti vā, asiddhe dharmiṇi pratiṣedhāsambhavāddharmijñānamādyamupajīvyaṃ dvitīyaṃ tūpajīvakamiti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10700: upajīvye 'śodhite parīkṣayāpramāṇādavivikte upajīvakena bādhite na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10708: (astveva) astyevedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānayorupajīvyopajīvakabhāva upajīvyasyopajīvakena bādhaśca /
GSP33nysu__3u:10711: parīkṣayā śodhitamupajīvyaṃ virodhyupajīvakaṃ bādhate svayaṃ tena na bādhyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10717: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tu na śodhitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10732: ātyantikaparīkṣaiva bādhakatvopayoginī bhavatu kimupajīvyatvenetyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10740: yadyapyekamevedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tathāpi viṣayopādhivaśād vibhāgam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10744: sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10753: asminpakṣe yadupajīvyaṃ na tadupajīvakena bādhyate yacca bādhyate na tadupajīvyamityato nedamasmadīyaniyamabhaṅgasyodāharaṇamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:10759: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāṃ tattvamasyādīnāṃ ca kathamupajīvyopajīvakabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10762: naca prāptiṃ vinā pratiṣedho 'stīti prāptirūpaṃ yaḥ sarvajña
GSP33nysu__3u:10763: ityādikamupajīvyam, tattvamasyādikaṃ tūpajīvakamiti vā, asiddhe dhamirṇi pratiṣedhānupapatterdharmipratipādakamādyamupajīvyamupajīvakaṃ cottaramiti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10767: yadbādhyate sārvajñādikaṃ na tadupajīvyamiti na kaścidvirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:10772: tatkathamityataḥ prathamapakṣe tāvadvaiṣamyaṃ darśayati- suparīkṣita iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10774: prathamapramāṇe suparīkṣite sati na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10776: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvyamapyaparīkṣitatvādupajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamati jñānena bādhyate
GSP33nysu__3u:10780: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāmahaṃ duḥkhītyādīnāṃ ca suparīkṣitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10781: upapāditaṃ khalu yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśrutīnāṃ tattvāvedakatvaṃ sākṣiṇaśca niyamenāvyabhicāritvamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:10783: sarvaṃ tadupajīvyaiva pramāṇaṃ vartate yataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.160ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:10784: yataḥ kāraṇāttatsarvaṃ sārvajñādikamupajīvyaiva tattvamasītyādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartate 'to na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10786: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ purovartinaḥ svarūpamātraṃ dharmīkṛtya pravartate na tu rajatatvaviśiṣyaṃ na tathā tattvamasyādivākyaṃ pravartitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__3u:10787: kintu sarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ duḥkhādiviśiṣyaṃ jīvasvarūpaṃ ca dharmīkṛtyaiva
GSP33nysu__3u:10790: nanu tattvamasyādivākyamapi yadi svarūpamātramupajīvya pravarteta tadā kīdṛśo doṣa ityata āha- kathamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10792: vihāya yasmātkasmāccit svarūpasyaiva ced yadi // MAnuv_3,4.161 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10796: dharmānvihāya svarūpasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ cettarhi tatkathaṃ jñeyaṃ yattattvamasīti bodhyate
GSP33nysu__3u:10803: tathāca na kaściddoṣa ityataḥ śiṣyaṃ vākyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10804: yadi tattvādidharmopetasyopajīvyatvaṃ tarhi sarvajñatvādikaṃ vihāya yasmātkasmāccittattvādestadbrahmeti kathaṃ jñeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10815: nanu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ yathā svarūpamātramupajīvya pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10816: tathedamapi pravartsyati ko doṣa ityata āha- svarūpasyaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10827: sarvalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tu svarūpaṃ yadi bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,4.163ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10829: bhaṇyate tacchabdena iti yadi bhaṇyate ityāvṛttyā yojyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10833: prativādyuktārthāṅgīkāre pratijñāhāniḥ kathaṃ na bhavedityata āha- na iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10836: anena cāṅgīkṛtena no 'smākaṃ (na pratijñāhā)naiva hāniḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10855: akhilaṃ yogyānvitaṃ svarūpaṃ viśeṣasāmānyatayā śabdabodhyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:10857: taccaikasya padasya sāmānyata eva na viśeṣata iti na buddhau brahmārohaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10858: yadi ca viśeṣastadā dharmigrāhivirodhastadavastha eveti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10862: naca tatrāpi vyāvṛttasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ na svarūpamātrasyetyuktamiti vācyam
GSP33nysu__3u:10867: vyāvartayanti tadrūpaṃ caitramātrad vinaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10868: devadattādau yaścaitrādibhramastatra purovartitvapūrvāṇi viśeṣaṇāni devadattādisvarūpaṃ devadattāderaviditatvāccaitramātrādvinaivāpurovartyādibhyo vyāvartayanti yasmāttasmādbādhakajñānaṃ vyāvṛttamevopajīvatīti niyamo nānupapannaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10878: brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatvād vyāvartayati kiṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.166ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10880: kiṃ kartṛ, brahma vyāvartayati, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10885: tadedaṃ vākyaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ jñātasyaiva jñāpakaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:10889: vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādiśrutyā brahmalakṣaṇatvenoktena cinmātratvādinā tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- cinmātratvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10894: cinmātratvādikaṃ na brahmaṇo bhinnam ato nirviśeṣatvāvirodhāttadaṅgīkriyata ityata āha- tāvanmātramiti
GSP33nysu__3u:10895: tāvanmātraṃ yadīṣyaṃ syāt sarvajñatvaṃ kuto na tat // MAnuv_3,4.167cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:10903: yathā nedaṃ rajatamiti jñāne 'viruddhapurovartitvādyupetasya dharmitvaṃ na viruddharajatatvādyupetasyetyata āha- cinmātreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10905: cinmātreṇābhedaścinmātrābhedaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ pratipādyo yasya tattathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10909: taccidaikyaṃ prativādino bodhyasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10914: svābhedāṅgīkṛtau cidabhedaḥ kathaṃ siddha ityata āha- cittvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10918: virodhabhayātsarvajñatvādiviśiṣyaṃ na dharmīkriyate iti vadatā cidānandarūpamapi na dharmīkartavyam
GSP33nysu__3u:10921: cinmātraṃ tvadatiriktaṃ nāstīti vākyārtha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:10925: na virodhabhayādvayaṃ sārvajñādikaṃ dharmiṇi na niveśayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10942: yatparasāpekṣaṃ tanna sadityaṅgīkāre brahmaṇaścetanatvaṃ ca na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10955: jñasya brahmaṇo jñeyaṃ svayameva vā syātparaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:10957: svajñeyatvaṃ ca naivāsau manyate saviśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.170ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:10960: kuto na manyata ityata āha- saviśeṣata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:10962: pratyak parāgbhāvalakṣaṇo hi kartṛkarmabhāvo naikatraikasya yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10963: yadi ca syāttadā bhedapratinidhinā viśeṣeṇa ghaṭanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10965: nivirśeṣaṃ ca brahmāṅgīkṛtamiti svajñeyatvaṃ na manyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10967: tacca mithyābhūtamiti kathaṃ tadapekṣaṃ cetanatvaṃ satsyāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10969: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā svarūpamātramupajīvyamityapi vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10980: svaṃ ca tadrūpaṃ ceti hi svarūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:10982: tena svasminprāpte 'pyucyamānaḥ svaśabdaḥ parisaṅkhayānyāyena paravyāvṛttimeva pratipādayatīti jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:10985: ... svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ na cet // MAnuv_3,4.170 //
GSP33nysu__3u:10986: na svarūpābhidhāyi syād vaiyarthyaṃ svaravasya yat /
GSP33nysu__3u:10988: asmadabhipretaṃ vyākhyānaṃ na cedaṅgīkriyate tadā svarūpaṃ nāma kiṃ, na kimapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:10990: rūpaśabdasamānārthaḥ svarūpaśabda ityataḥ kathametaditi cedatra vaktavyam
GSP33nysu__3u:10994: yasmādasminpakṣe svaśabdasya vaiyarthyaṃ tasmātsvarūpaṃ nāma kimita sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:10997: nahi rūpaśabdo rūpaśabdārthaṃ nābhidhava iti sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11005: pratītipramāṇaka eva śabdārthaniścaya iti hi śābdāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11011: yaduktaṃ cetanatvaṃ brahmaṇo na syāditi tadiṣyāpādanam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11015: tadarthā eva cetanatvavādā vyākhyātavyā ityataścaitanyamapi na pareṇa śakyāṅgīkāramiti bhāvena tadvayākhyāti- cetanasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11016: cetanasya svabhāvo hi caitanyamiti gīyate // MAnuv_3,4.172ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11019: iti hi gīyata ityanena guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ceti smṛtiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11025: yasmāccaitanyaṃ nāma jñānaṃ tasmāccaitanyasya brahmaṇo, viśeṣato
GSP33nysu__3u:11032: parantu mithyeti tatsāpekṣaṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ satsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11033: brahmaṇo jñānatve jñeyādyupetatā kuta iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11039: na jñeyajñātṛhīnaṃ hi jñānaṃ nāma kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.173ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11040: yaduktaṃ prāgbrahmaṇaścetanatve jñeyajñānopetatvena bhāvyamiti, tatrāpi jñatvātsammatavaditi niyāmakamabhipretam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11042: jñeyajñānavihīnaśca jña ityatra ca na pramā // MAnuv_3,4.173cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11045: nanu prasiddhasya jñānasya jñeyādyupetatve 'pīdaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ tadrahitaṃ bhavatu kiṃ bādhakamityata āha- jñātṛjñeyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11047: hīnaṃ bhojanameva syāt tāḍanaṃ kartṛtāḍyataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.174 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11049: kartṛ tāḍyata iti tāḍayitṛtāḍyābhyāṃ hīnaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11051: ākāṅkṣāvaśātsakarmakatayā pratīyamānamapi ca yadi niṣkarmakaṃ syāttadokto bahutaro 'tiprasaṅgaḥ, viśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11054: nahi sakarmakakriyāyāḥ kartā kriyādirahito yukta iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11058: akāryaṃ ca brahmākhyaṃ jñānamiti na tasya kartrādyapekṣetyāśayavān
GSP33nysu__3u:11060: nityatvāt tādṛśaṃ ca syāditi cen ... // MAnuv_3,4.175ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11062: anityasya bhojanāderbhoktrādyapekṣāyāmapīdaṃ nityatvāttādṛśaṃ jñātrādirahitaṃ ca syādityanena vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā vyāpyaviparyayaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11068: ata eva kaściddhātvarthaḥ karmādyanvitaḥ kaścinneti yujyata ityāśayavānākāṅkṣāmaprayojakīkṛtya kāryatvādyeva prayojakīkurvāṇasyātiprasaṅgamāha- nityeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11077: kathaṃ na sā tādṛśītyata āha- draṣṭāra iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11078: draṣṭāro vedavāco hi santi vācyāni cāñjasā // MAnuv_3,4.176ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11081: nanu santi sthitisamaye vedavāco vasiṣṭhādayo draṣṭāra indrādayaśca vācyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11082: natu mahāpralaya ityata āha- nitya iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11083: nityo draṣṭā ca vācyaśca bhagavāneva ca svayam // MAnuv_3,4.176cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11084: na hi vaktṛvihīnā ca vācyahīnāpi vāk kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.177ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11090: yathā vedavāgvācyādyupetāpi kvacittadrahitā tathā brahma (sva)rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vyavahāre jñeyādyanvitamapi paramārthatastadrahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratyāśāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:11095: jñātṛjñeyavihīnaṃ ca jñānamevaṃ na tad bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.177cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11100: ākāṅkṣānimittaṃ pratisambandhyanvitatvaṃ nityatvena na hīyata ityetāvanmātre(ṇa) vāgudāharaṇasya gṛhītatvānna doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11107: yasmāttasmādevaṃ nityo 'pi jño jñānajñeyavihīno naiva vidyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11108: śaktiḥ kārakamiti pakṣasya sthitvānnityo vakteti yujyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11112: kiñca sarvavilopaśca kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,4.179ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11118: nanu neha nānāsti kiñcanetyāgamasya sadbhāvātkathaṃ viśvamithyātve mānābhāva iti cedatra pṛcchāmaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11119: atra sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratipādayati vākye sarvāntargatatvenedaṃ vākyametadvākyārthaśca gṛhyate na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11121: sarveṇa saha tad vākyāmarthaśca yadi gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11122: tadabhāvena sarvasya nāpalāpo bhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,4.179c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:11126: na gṛhyate ced tannyāyādapalāpo na hi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.180ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11135: nanu vākyodāharaṇe kṛte naivaṃvidhaṃ vākyamastīti vā (e)naiṣāṃ padānāmatra
GSP33nysu__3u:11136: śaktirar(nā)stīti vā nāsya vākyasyātra tātparyamastīti vā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11137: anena vikalpanirākaraṇena tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ syādityata āha- upapattīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11146: atra cāstyupapattivirodha iti jñāpanāya vikalpya dūṣaṇābhidhānaṃ kṛtamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:11149: tatropapattivirodhe 'pyanyairliṅgairasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamavagamyatāmityata āha- upakramādīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11152: upakramādiliṅgānāṃ madhye yadyaduttaraṃ tattadbalīya ityupapattireva balīyasī /
GSP33nysu__3u:11153: śrutyādau liṅgasamūhe ca yadyatpūrvaṃ tattadbalīya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11155: tato balavadvirodhe satāmanyeṣāṃ liṅgānāṃ na tātparyaniścāyakatvaṃ yuktam
GSP33nysu__3u:11161: itaśca nāpyasya vākyasya prapañcamithyātve tātparyamāha- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11186: tarhi niravakāśaṃ vākyamapramāṇaṃ prasajyata ityata āha- upapanna iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11188: pratyakṣādipramāṇopakramādiliṅgāvirodhini tadānukūlyopapanne ca bhagavati svagatabhedābhāve 'rthe vākyasya sati sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11189: neha nāneti vākyasyāpavyākhyāne nirākṛte labdhamāha- mukhyārtha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11190: mukhyārthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyaṃ niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,4.183cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11192: tasminnavidyamāne tu sāvarjñaṃ na pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11196: ata eva mukhyārthe vākyasya vidyamāne sati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11197: anena prapañcamithyātvāsiddheḥ kva sārvajñaṃ niṣidhyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11206: yathā yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sthāṇurityatrāropitena puruṣatvena vyāvṛttaṃ vastu dharmīkṛtya pravṛttāvapi nopajīvyavirodha ityata āha- apalāpo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11207: apalāpo 'pi sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate // MAnuv_3,4.184cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11213: nanu ca tattvamasyādivākyameva jīvabrahmaṇorekatāṃ pratipādayatsārvajñādiguṇajātasya mithyātvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11215: tatkathaṃ guṇānāṃ mithyātve pramāṇābhāva iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:11219: anādiyogyatā coktā tena grāhyaiva sarvathā // MAnuv_3,4.185ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11223: yadā devamānavadānavarūpā tadavāntarabhedarūpā ca jīvānāṃ yogyatānādinityā pramitā tadā kā vārtā jīvabrahmaṇorekatvasya /
GSP33nysu__3u:11224: tathā ca kathaṃ tatsiddhaye guṇānāṃ mithyātvakalpanamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11226: muktānāṃ tāratamyaṃ ca mānairuktairna cālyate // MAnuv_3,4.185cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11234: jñānino 'pi yato nityaṃ kurvanti śubhameva hi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11235: tāratamyaṃ tu muktau ca tenaivādhyavasīyate // MAnuv_3,4.186 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11242: idānīṃ tu jñānena niścitamokṣāṇāmapi śubhāśubhakaraṇaparityāgatāratamyāducyata iti bhedaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11244: tāratamyaṃ na cenmuktau kutaḥ kuryuḥ śubhaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.187ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11246: yadi brahmādyā muktau tāratamyavanto na syustadā jñānamātreṇa mokṣasya prāptaprāyatvājjñānottarakālaṃ śubhaṃ na kuryuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11249: kṛcchreṇāpi tapo jñānaṃ karmāpyete caranti hi // MAnuv_3,4.187cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11250: bibhyati smāśubhānnityaṃ sakāmāśca śubhe sadā // MAnuv_3,4.188ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11253: karmeti yajñādi ete jñāninaḥ kṛcchreṇāpītyādiviśeṣaṇānāṃ phalamanupadameva jñāsyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11254: sakāmāśca śubhe sadetyekasya tapaādeścaraṇakāle tapaādyantaraṃ kāmayanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11255: tasmājjñānottarakālānuṣṭhitena vicitreṇa śubhena vicitrāmānandabuddhiṃ prāpnuvantīti śeṣaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11261: te hi prāgjñānodayādādaranairantaryābhyāṃ śubhānyanuṣṭhitavantastatsvābhāvyamāpannā jñānodayānantaramapyanutiṣṭhantītyāṅkaya pariharati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11262: na ca svabhāva evāyaṃ bhayapūrvapravṛttitaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.188cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11270: ataḥ tatsvabhāvā eva saṃvṛttāra idānīmapi tatsvābhāvyena tathaiva kurvantītyaṅgīkāre ko doṣa ityāśaṅkayāha- tādṛśo 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11274: tatra jñānināṃ śubhapravṛttiḥ pūrvatarapūrvatamasvabhāvabalāyātaiva natu phalavatītyaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ prati yadi kaścid brūyāt ajñānināmapi śubhā pravṛttiḥ pūrvatarapūrvamasvabhāvagataiva na tu phalavatī viśeṣābhāvāditi,
GSP33nysu__3u:11277: phalavattve pramāṇaṃ cet tatra jñasya samaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.189cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11281: yato 'jñānikṛtakarmaṇāṃ saphalatve”karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi'; ityādikaṃ pramāṇamasti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11285: evaṃ tarhi jñāniṣvapi na svabhāvakalpanā yuktetyāśayavānāha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11297: jñānino 'pi yatastena kartavyaṃ śubhameva taiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.191 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11303: upāste sa ya ātmānaṃ kṣīyate nāsya karma ha /
GSP33nysu__3u:11304: asmāddhayevātmano yadyat kāmayet sṛjate ca tat // MAnuv_3,4.192 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11305: anena”sa ya ātmānameva lokamupāste na hyasya karma kṣīyate
GSP33nysu__3u:11310: sa vidvānmukto bhūtvā yadyatkāmayate tattatkarmāsmāddhayevātmano 'syātmanaḥ prasādena sṛjate
GSP33nysu__3u:11318: yadevetyanena”yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'; iti śrutimupādatte /
GSP33nysu__3u:11330: tathā jñānādipadaṃ parokṣajñānārthatayā na vyākhyeyamityapi grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11332: na hi jñānaṃ vinā kvāpi phalasyākṣayatā bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.194cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11337: brahmasākṣātkārarahitenopāsakena kṛtāni karmāṇyakṣayaphalāni kena prakāreṇeti cintyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11343: puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyata iti svargādiphalānāṃ kṣayitvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11361: muktau tāratamyamasahamānena khalvevamanyathā vyākhyānaṃ kriyate tanmuktatāratamyameva sādhayati
GSP33nysu__3u:11365: vicitreṇa jñānena vicitra eva mokṣo bhāvanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11371: evamapi jñānottarakarmaṇo mokṣāntargataphalahetutāyāḥ pramāṇāntareṇa siddhermuktatāratamyaṃ na hātuṃ śakyamityabhyupagamavādenāha-
GSP33nysu__3u:11379: etena jñānottarasya karmaṇaḥ sāphalye 'pi tasya phalasya mokṣānupraveśitāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvānna mokṣatāratamyasiddhirityapi pratyuktam
GSP33nysu__3u:11385: jñānārthatvaṃ vā bhogārthatvaṃ vā vyarthatvaṃ veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11389: jñānātpūrvabhāvināṃ śubhānāṃ yasamājjñānenaiva kāryeṇa kṛtārthatā nānyena
GSP33nysu__3u:11395: tatra hetuḥ prārabdhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ bhogenaiva kṛtārthateti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11408: tatra sarveṣāṃ jñānārthatāyāṃ prasaktāyāṃ viśeṣamāha- jñānādīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11411: jñānātpūrvāṇyakāmyānyeva śubhāni karmāṇi puṇyakarmāṇi jñānasiddhaye bhavanti na tu kāmyāni
GSP33nysu__3u:11418: nanu yathākāmyāni śubhānīti ca viśeṣaṇamupādīyate tathā nityanaimittikavyatiriktānītyapi viśeṣaṇamupādeyam
GSP33nysu__3u:11427: atra yogyatāyā balācchubhamāditaḥ kṛtametacca jñānameva kuryāditi ca vaktavye yadubhayatra bāhulyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tattasya nāsmatpakṣapratīpatetyuktaprapañcanārthamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11429: atra ca karmatāratamyājjñānatāratamyaṃ jñānatāratamyānmokṣatāratamyamiti vadatā ca sūcitam
GSP33nysu__3u:11433: asmiñchāstre yatra yatra jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvamucyate tatra tatra jñānamiti padena bhaktirīryate lakṣyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11443: yadyadā jñānasyaiva viśeṣaḥ snehādisāhityalakṣaṇo dharmo bhavati tadā sa piṇḍo bhaktirityabhidhīyate
GSP33nysu__3u:11454: snehayogo 'pi tadvat syād viśeṣo jñānagocaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.200cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11458: lākṣaṇikaprayoge sūtrakārasya kiṃ prayojanamityata āha- ityabhiprāyata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11469: bhaktiśabdo māhātmyajñānapūrvakasya snehasya vācaka ityuktaṃ tathā jñānaśabdo bhaktyartha iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11477: kvāpi bhaktirjñānamiti padābhyāṃ so 'yaṃ snehalakṣaṇo bodhalakṣaṇaśca viśeṣo 'pyudīryate
GSP33nysu__3u:11483: nanu vinā snehājjñānamātreṇa yadi muktiranupapannā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11501: dveṣasya muktisādhaśratvāṅgīkāre kathaṃ sarvaśrutivirodha ityatastāvadekāṃ śrutiṃ paṭhati- cetanasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11502: cetanasya dvayaṃ bhogyaṃ saṃsāro muktireva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:11504: muktiśca dvividhā tatra sukhaṃ nityaṃ tathāparam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11506: kāmyaṃ karma niṣiddhaṃ ca sājñānamiti niścayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.204 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11516: saṃsṛtau saṃsṛtiviṣaye, sādhanamapi dveṣo bhaktiśceti yogyatayā sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11522: nityaduḥkhasvarūpāṇāṃ mukteḥ kāraṇatvena tāvad dveṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11523: tena sanmuktikāraṇaṃ na bhavatīti jñāyate virodhāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11526: ataḥ kiṃ kena saṅgatamityata āha- muktāviti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11540: na kevalaṃ bhaktyā kintu dveṣato 'pi viśiṣyā muktiścedaṅgīkriyate tadā
GSP33nysu__3u:11544: vadanti śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ purāṇānyāgamā api // MAnuv_3,4.207c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:11552: tathāca kathaṃ dveṣato muktyaṅgīkāre na mahātātparyavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11556: yadi dveṣeṇa muktiḥ syād vaktavyo doṣasañcayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.208ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11560: tato mokṣārthaṃ pravṛtto vedādirguṇāneva pratipādayanmokṣasya bhaktimātrasādhyatvamabhipraitīti gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11561: nanu dveṣāccaidyādayo nṛpā ityādīni dveṣasyāpi mokṣasādhanatāṃ pratipādayanti vākyāni santi
GSP33nysu__3u:11562: tatkathaṃ dveṣasya muktisādhanatvābhāva ityata āha- smartavya iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11566: bhagavānnityaṃ smartavya ityabhiprāyeṇaiva dveṣānmuktimāheva purāṇakṛditi sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11569: purāṇavākyaṃ dveṣasya muktisādhanatvaṃ pratipādayadivāpātato yadyapi pratīyateta /
GSP33nysu__3u:11571: kintu mumukṣuṇā bhagavansarvadā smartavya iti tasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11572: yathā”vṛddhau ca mātāpitarau sādhvī bhāryā sutaḥ śiśuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11573: apyakāryaśataṃ kṛtvā bhartavyā manurabravīt'; ityatra nākāryakaraṇe tātparyaṃ kintu sarvathā bhartavyatve, tathehāpīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11575: caidyādīnāṃ dveṣato muktiṃ pratipādayadvākyaṃ bhagavataḥ kṛpālutvādīnguṇānāheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11576: śāpādinā dveṣiṇo 'pi caidyādyāstātkālikadveṣamanirūpya pūrvatanīṃ bhaktimevāpekṣya bhagavatā sūcitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11577: aho kṛpālutvaṃ nirvikāratvaṃ satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ ca tasyetyatra tātparyaṃ teṣāṃ vākyānāmityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11578: dvividhāni vākyāni, vaireṇa yannṛpataya ityādīni smaraṇapradhānāni teṣāṃ prathamā gatiḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11579: dveṣāccaidyādaya ityādīni dveṣapradhānāni teṣāṃ dvitīyeti hṛdayam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11581: kruddhavākyasya yathā na pratīta evārthapramāṇyam kintvanyatra,
GSP33nysu__3u:11588: “jīva vā mara vā sādho vyādha mā jīva mā mara'; iti prayogadarśanāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11591: pitā kiñcitputraṃ prati vidhatte idaṃ kurvīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11595: tasya vākyasya yathā na putramaraṇavidhāne tātparyaṃ kintu svavihitakaraṇe /
GSP33nysu__3u:11596: tathāca dveṣeṇa smaraṇe muktirbhavatīti purāṇavākyasyāpi na dveṣasya muktisādhanatve tātpayarm
GSP33nysu__3u:11601: pratīta evārthaḥ kinna syādityata āha- śrutīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11606: yatra dveṣasya muktisādhanatvamucyate tatraiva tadviruddhamucyata iti svavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11611: tamo dveṣeṇa saṃyānti bhaktayā muktiṃ tathaiva ca /
GSP33nysu__3u:11614: viṣṇau bhaktyā jātena viṣṇuprasādenaiva muktiṃ saṃyānti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11615: tathā viṣṇau dveṣeṇa jātena vilomatvena viṣṇukopenāñjasā tamaḥ saṃyāntīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11617: uktārthaniyāmakaṃ viṣṇubhaktireva muktisādhanaṃ na dveṣa ityasyārthasya niyāmakam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11618: etadvākyasamākhyayā cetanasyeti śrutau muktāvitiśabdo viṣṇorvācaka iti siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11619: tathāca dveṣo bhaktiścetyetad dvayaṃ sanmukteḥ kevalo dveṣastvasanmukteḥ kāraṇamityanyathāpratītirapāstā bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11623: mokṣaprayojanānāṃ sarvāgamānāṃ bhagavadguṇeṣveva yanmahātātparyaṃ tadanyathānupapattyā bhaktireva muktisādhanaṃ na dveṣa ityavagamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11624: ato mahātātparyavirodhena ca dveṣavākyaṃ pratītārthe kathaṃ pramāṇatāṃ yāti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11641: kathamayaṃ mahātātparyaśabdārtha ityata āha- vācakatvaṃ hīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11646: tasya ca mahacchabdena viśeṣaṇe yogyatayaiṣo 'rtho mahātātparyaśabdasya bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11649: so 'rthaḥ kathaṃ parityājya ekaśabdasya saṃśaye // MAnuv_3,4.213b-d //
GSP33nysu__3u:11652: ekaśabdasya saṃśaye ekavākyasambandhini saṃśaye satyekaṃ sandigdhaṃ viruddhārthaṃ vākyamādāyetyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11654: sarvāṇi vākyāni sambhūyānanyārthatayā yamekamarthaṃ pratipādayanti tadviruddhārthaṃ pratipādayattadavāntaravākyaṃ yaduṇlabhyate sāvakāśaṃ ca tanmahāvākyārthavirodhādanyathā kriyate na tu tadviruddho mahāvākyārthastyajyata iti tāvatprasiddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11657: prakṛte tu bhaktireva muktisādhanaṃ na dveṣa iti sarvairvākyaiḥ sambhūya pratipādito 'rthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11662: ato vijñānabhaktibhyāṃ puruṣārthaḥ paro bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.213ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11664: mokṣa iti vaktavye paraḥ puruṣārtha iti vadatā jñānādikamapi dveṣiṇāṃ na bhavatīti sūcitam
GSP33nysu__3u:11666: evaṃ dveṣasya muktisādhanatvaṃ nirākṛtyedānīṃ bhakteḥ paramapuruṣārthasādhakatve pramāṇaṃ nāstīti yaduktaṃ tannirāsāya pramāṇāntaramāha- yasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11667: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33nysu__3u:11668: tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.214 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11669: bhaktyā jñānaṃ tato bhaktistato dṛṣṭistataśca sā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11670: tato muktistato bhaktiḥ saiva syāt sukharūpiṇī // MAnuv_3,4.215//
GSP33nysu__3u:11673: nāhaṃ vedairna tapasā na dānena nacejyayā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11676: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣyuṃ ca parantapa // MAnuv_3,4.218 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11678: yathā deve devayogyā tathā gurau guruyogyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11692: ananyabhakti sā jñeyā viṣṇāveva ca sā bhavet'; iti ca smṛtiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11695: ityādivākyataśceti caśabdena cetanasya dvayamityādīni pūrvodāhṛtavākyāni samuccinoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11698: na ca prasādamāpnoti dveṣād bhaktyā tamāpnuyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11701: bhagavadbhaktyā taṃ bhagavatprasādaṃ prāpnuyādityasminnarthe dṛṣṭānusāritvaṃ patyakṣadṛṣṭavyāptikānumānānusāritvamapīyate jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11706: yo yatprasādo nāsau taddveṣasādhyo yagā guruprasādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11709: yo yaddveṣaḥ sa tatprasādasādhanaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11711: athavā bhagavānsvadveṣiṇi na prasīdati prekṣāvatpuruṣatvāt devadattavat /
GSP33nysu__3u:11712: yadvā bhagavaddveṣī bhagavatprītiviṣayo na bhavati bhagavaddveṣitvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11717: yo yatprasādaḥ sa tadbhaktisādhyo yathā guruprasādaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11719: yā yadbhaktiḥ sā tatprasādasādhanaṃ yathā gurubhaktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11725: bhakteḥ prasādasādhanatve siddhe muktisādhanatvameva siddhaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11728: ato lokavilakṣaṇo dviṣyo 'pi prasīdatītyāṅgīkāre na bādhakamiti
GSP33nysu__3u:11730: ye pṛthag vihitā viṣṇorguṇā vedena sādaram /
GSP33nysu__3u:11733: pṛthag lokavailakṣaṇyena, sādaraṃ tātparyeṇa, dṛṣṭavailomyād dṛṣṭavailomyamanādṛtya /
GSP33nysu__3u:11737: doṣābhāvāśca ye vedairuditā avihāya tān // MAnuv_3,4.221cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11738: doṣābhāvāśca ye vedairuditā avihāya tān // MAnuv_3,4.221ef //

GSP33nysu__3u:11744: sarvathāpi doṣo bhagavati nāstītyatra sāmānyataḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ tātparyasya nirṇītatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11748: yadvā bṛhatsaṃhiterito 'rtho hi siddhānta iti tatra bahumānamutpādayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11753: na kevalaṃ viṣṇau kintu tadbhakteṣu ramādiṣvapi, viniścayāt sarvathā, sā ca kriyamāṇā tāratamyenaiva
GSP33nysu__3u:11765: yo hi bhaktaḥ pradhāne syāt tadīyeṣvapi bhaktimān /
GSP33nysu__3u:11775: nanu daityādayo brahmādiṣu bhaktimanto 'pi tadbhakteṣvindrādiṣu bhaktirahitā dṛśyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:11776: tato vyabhicāra ityata āha- vyabhicāra iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11777: vyabhicāro yadi kvāpi bhaktihrāso 'tra kalpyate // MAnuv_3,4.225ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11778: yadi kvāpi pareṇa vyabhicāraścodyate tadāsmābhiratra puruṣe bhaktihrāsaḥ kalpyate viphalabhaktitvamucyate
GSP33nysu__3u:11779: tathāca vipakṣe viśiṣyasya hetorabhāvānna vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11780: kuta evaṃ kalpyata ityata āha- bhaktīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11781: bhaktidoṣo hyasau yanna tadbhakteṣvapi bhaktimān // MAnuv_3,4.225cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11782: tadbhakteṣvapi bhaktimānneti yadasau pradhānabhaktereva doṣo hi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11783: tena pradhānabhaktireva duṣyā na phalāyālamiti prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11784: hiraṇyagarbhādibhirdaityādibhyo 'maratvādikaṃ sacchalameva dīyate mṛṣā na bhavatīti purāṇeṣu suprasiddhameveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11786: tadbhaktabhaktiḥ kartavyetyetadanumānenopapādya sā ca tāratamyena kāryetyetadanumānena sādhayati- tāratamyeneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11789: teṣu tadbhakteṣu kriyamāṇā bhaktiraddhā sarvathā tāratamyena kāryā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11793: tadanyathā sāmyena vaiparītyena ca karaṇe 'nartho bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11797: tatprītyanusāreṇa tasya yasminyathā prītistadanusāreṇa bhaktikaraṇe sati tasminbhakte tasya rājādeḥ prītiraddhā niyamenaiva dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11803: etenaiva bhagavadbhakteṣu ramābrahmādiṣu tāratamyenaiva muktiḥ karaṇīyeti samarthitenaiva devatātāratamyaparijñānaṃ yatprāguktaṃ tadapi mokṣasya sādhanamiti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11804: na hyavidite tāratamye tāratamyānurodhena muktikaraṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11810: teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇaiva kāryā nityaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ // MAnuv_3,4.229ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11815: sarve 'pi guravaścaite puruṣasya sadaiva hi // MAnuv_3,4.229cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11816: tasmāt pūjyāśca namyāśca dhyeyāśca parito harim /
GSP33nysu__3u:11824: pūjyāścetyādinā bhaktereva prapañcanaṃ hariṃ parito na tu pṛthak /
GSP33nysu__3u:11825: vedānusārata iti yaduktaṃ tadapyanena daśirtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11826: krameṇaiva tayīyeṣu bhaktistatsmṛtirityādau tacchabdena tadīyā ucyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:11828: krameṇeti hariviṣayāṇi bhaktyādīni mukhyasādhanāni tadīyaviṣayāṇi tvamukhyasādhanānītyarthaḥ
GSP33nysu__3u:11833: pravṛtte pañcarātre hi sādhanasya vinirṇayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.233cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11839: bhaktiryato yathā svasminnityādyā yuktiratra ca // MAnuv_3,4.234 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11841: vaiṣṇavairdaityādiṣu kriyamāṇe dveṣe vyabhicāraṃ vārayituṃ sadityuktam /

GSP33nysu__3u:11854: iha kramāditi pratijñāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaprakṣepeṇa bhagavadbhaktabhakteḥ kartavyatvaṃ tattāratamyasya cāvaśyakatvaṃ siddhayati /

GSP33nysu__3u:11878: tadetajjñānakarmādiphalaṃ kiṃ prerakatvāddevānāṃ bhavati uta kartṛtvāddevadattasyeti saṃśaye prathamasūtreṇa devānāmeveti pūrvapakṣayitvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11882: tatra devānāṃ jñānādiphalamiti pūrvapakṣāṃśo grāhya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11889: devadattenānuṣṭhitasya jñānādeḥ phalaṃ devānāṃ bhavatītyekā pratijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11890: bhavacca tatkrameṇaiva na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena veti dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11892: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11897: anena prathamapratijñāyāṃ svātantryahetuḥ sūcito bhavati yaḥ sūtre svāmipadenoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11899: tathāpi phalaprāptāvuktasya svāmitvahetoḥ sāmarthyena prāptamiti tadapyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11900: yadi svātantryāddevadattānuṣṭhitajñānādiphalaṃ devānāṃ syāttarhi tadanuṣṭhitamithyājñānādiphalamapi prasajyetāviśeṣādityata āha- aśubhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11902: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //

GSP33nysu__3u:11907: anyagamiti vadatā svagataṃ tu bhavatīti sūcitam /

GSP33nysu__3u:11930: yataḥ kāraṇāddehāntare sthitiḥ, parapuraṃ praviśya tatra
GSP33nysu__3u:11937: kiñca te devā vāsudevājñayaiva na tu svecchayā tattatkṛtapūrvakarmānusārata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11938: ata evārāgadveṣato rāgadveṣau vinaiva nityaśo jīvānpuṇyapāpeṣu prerayanti hi yasmāttasmātkathaṃ doṣānavāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11940: pāpādipreraṇena devānāmaśubhaṃ na bhavatītyeva kevalaṃ na, kintu haryājñānuṣṭhānājjyotiṣyomādyanuṣṭhātṛbhirivaibhirdevaiḥ puṇyamevāpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11941: kiñca svavihitaparapreraṇe haripūjeyamiti coddeśātkathaṃ devā na śubhamāpanuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11949: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.243ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11958: tatrāpi tāratamye ko heturityata uktam- dravyeti //

GSP33nysu__3u:11999: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate |

GSP33nysu__3u:12010: kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāre yadu kiñcemāḥ prajā iti sāvadhāraṇaśrutivirodha ātreyavacanavirodhaśca syādityata uktam- mahaditi //

GSP33nysu__3u:12023: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12045: jñānadānaṃ kimāviṣkāreṇa kāryamutānāviṣkāreṇeti saṃśaye pūrvavadatrāpi pūrvapakṣamatyantaheyatvābhāvātprapañcenāṃha- jñānadā apīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12048: na kevalaṃ śiṣyāḥ kintu jñānadā ācāryā api jñānaphalamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12050: ācāryā ityenenaiva siddhe jñānadā iti vacanaṃ jñānadāneneti jñāpanārtham /
GSP33nysu__3u:12055: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12061: tataḥ paramagurorapare guravaḥ svaśiṣyaphalāpekṣayā sārdhaṃ tāvat adhyardhaṃ phalamāpanuvanti
GSP33nysu__3u:12079: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12081: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /

GSP33nysu__3u:12085: ato bahūnāṃ grahaṇāyāviṣkāreṇa jñānadānaṃ kāryamiti prāpte siddhāntamāha-

GSP33nysu__3u:12106: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
GSP33nysu__3u:12109: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tatphalaṃ ceti dṛṣṭaphalam śravaṇādisampūrtyanantarameva jñānamutpadyate /
